response.text: Can you turn the radio off for me? Please! I'm begging you!
I have been listening to the same music for four days! Look, they are torturing me!

Because they wanted my armor set. Last week I found this ceramic plate armor and a helmet from Station 11 with my partner. We couldn't agree on who gets to wear it, so I hid them behind the gas station behind his back. But that son of a bitch sold me to the Legionnaires! So here I am, locked up, tortured and forced to eat dog food sandwich.
